alert.note: Alert for Macoupin; Montgomery (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:09PM CST until January 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glazing are expected. * WHERE...Montgomery IL and Macoupin IL Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely remain slick and hazardous. Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
